subject: Re: [PATCH v4 1/2] mm/memory_hotplug: Add support to accept memory during hot-add

reviews.author: Pratik Sampat (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Pratik Sampat requested changes to ensure that memory is accepted before use in confidential computing guests, specifically addressing the limitation of the unaccepted memory bitmap not tracking hotplugged memory ranges.

reviews.author: Kiryl Shutsemau
reviews.summary: Reviewer Kiryl Shutsemau raised concerns about the patch's handling of unaccepted memory during hot-add, specifically pointing out that the current implementation may lead to crashes in certain scenarios and suggesting a more robust approach involving declaring unaccepted ranges upfront in the EFI memory map.

reviews.author: David (arm)
reviews.summary: Reviewer David (arm) expressed concerns that the patch is 'very hacky' and suggested a simpler approach to memory hotplug, specifically allocating the bitmap properly.
